no-colors.description: Turn off colors in CLI output

serverless-file-ext.description: Serverless configuration file name, Default: ts

region.description: region where the service should be deployed

aws-profile.description: AWS profile to use for deployment, Default: default

use-local-credentials.description: Use local credentials instead of AWS_PROFILE

param.description: Parameter to override in serverless configuration file

conceal.description: Hide secrets from the output (e.g. API Gateway key values)

force.description: Forces a deployment to take place

aws-s3-accelerate.description: Enables S3 Transfer Acceleration making uploading artifacts much faster

enforce-hash-update.description: Enforces new function version by overriding descriptions across all your functions. To be used only when migrating to new hashing algorithm.
